get.summary: Get all bookings with their services

200.description: List of bookings with their services

put.description: Update the services associated with a specific booking. Automatically recalculates the booking end time based on the total duration of all selected services.

200.description: Services synced successfully and booking end time recalculated

422.description: Validation error or invalid service IDs

get.summary: Get all services used in bookings
get.description: Returns all services that are associated with at least one booking

get.summary: Get a list of bookings with optional filters
get.description: Returns a list of bookings. Can filter by date (year, month, day), name, gender, and status

parameters.name: day
parameters.description: Filter bookings by day of month (1-31)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter bookings by customer name (partial match)

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Filter bookings by customer gender (male or female only)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter bookings by status (pending, confirmed, cancelled, or completed only)

error.description: Error message describing the validation failure
error.example: status needs to be pending, confirmed, cancelled or completed

value.error: status needs to be pending, confirmed, cancelled or completed or gender needs to be male or female
gender needs to be male or female

post.description: Creates a new booking with the provided information. Supports custom date formats like '2023-12-10 10h20m' or '2023/12/4 10h30m'. Automatically detects booking overlaps for the same gender and returns a warning that can be overridden with the force_create parameter.

force_create.description: Set to true to create booking even when overlaps are detected

message.example: An error occurred while creating the booking.

get.summary: Get booking by ID
get.description: Returns a single booking by ID with associated user details

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking to return

delete.description: Cancels a booking by setting its status to 'cancelled'

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking to cancel

patch.description: Updates a booking with the provided information. At least one field must be provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking to update

requestBody.description: Booking update data - at least one field must be provided

error.example: At least one field to update must be provided

items.example: Please include at least one of: date, name, email, telephone, gender, remarks, status

get.summary: Get all categories
get.description: Display a listing of the resource.

post.description: Creates a new category. Only the name field is mandatory, active is optional.

422.description: Validation error - Invalid or missing fields

get.summary: Get a specific category by ID

put.description: Updates an existing category. name is required.

name: The name field must be unique

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

get.summary: Get all categories for a product

put.summary: Sync categories for a product (replace all existing with the provided set)

requestBody.description: Add and remove categories. Send an array of category ids to add and/or change the current categories, send an empty array to remove all.

categories.description: Array of category IDs. Send an empty array [] to remove all categories.

404.description: Product not found or category not found

422.description: Validation error - Missing or invalid fields

get.summary: Get product by ID

get.summary: Get all services
get.description: Returns list of all active services

get.summary: Get all services (including inactive)
get.description: Returns list of all services regardless of active status

post.description: Creates a new service with duration-based pricing and returns the service details

requestBody.description: Required fields: name, description, hairlength, price, time. Optional fields: active

name: The name field is required.
time: The time must be between 1 and 480.

get.summary: Get service by ID

delete.description: Deletes a service by changing active to 0

put.description: Updates a service and returns the updated service details. All fields are optional for updates.

requestBody.description: Service update data - all fields are optional

time: The time must be between 1 and 480.

get.summary: Get a list of active users
get.description: Returns a list of all active users (status = 1)

email: The email has already been taken.

get.description: Returns a single user's details by their ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to return

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete

patch.description: Updates an existing user's information with the provided details. At least one field must be provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

requestBody.description: User update data - at least one field must be provided

error.example: At least one field to update must be provided

items.example: Please include at least one of: name, email, gender, telephone, role

email: The email has already been taken.
